settings.text: The Drive One app (“App”) and the website www.driveone.eu ("Website") are owned and operated by Needit ApS (“Needit”). The Drive One electronic device (the “Device”) is also developed and marketed by Needit.

Address: Hammerholmen 18, 2650 Hvidovre, Denmark
Email: support@driveone.eu

This privacy policy will explain how our organisation uses the personal data we collect from you when you use the App, Website and Device.

settings.heading: How you agree to the Privacy Policy

settings.text: By accessing and using the Website you consent to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this Privacy Policy, you must immediately leave the Website and cease using it and delete your account if you have registered such. When downloading and installing the App, or at any point later when the Privacy Policy has been updated, you have checked a box agreeing to the Privacy Policy. For further information on the terms on which you may use the Website, the App and the Device, please also see Needit’s Terms of Use.

settings.heading: What personal data do we collect?
